---
description: "Update or generate project documentation for a change"
tools: ["read", "search", "edit"]
---
# Generate/Update Docs

## Mission
Update documentation (README and/or `docs/`) to reflect a described code or CLI change.

## Requirements
- Keep examples short and accurate.
- Do not include secrets or real interaction IDs.
- If commands are shown, use `uv` forms used by this repo.
